creator: slavko_h@yahoo.com
text:
2.3.2

Response data for "Message 1" in "Mail Reader Sample" looks like:
--------------
Date: Fri Jan 09 15:48:41 PST 2009
To: qatest3@bluerealm.com
From: goNEW_qa <goNEW_qa@warrantysupport.net>
Subject: Some-Text

<body-text>
--------------

1) "issue"
But an email has other important fields which need to verify as well sometimes based on application functionality, like:
X-Priority: 1
Priority: urgent
Importance: high
So, would be nice to have these fields in the Response as well.

2) "issue"
Current implementation adds "CC:" list into "To:".
Would be nice to have "Cc:" filed as separate line in the Response as well.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: The next version of JMeter will have an option to "Store the message using MIME" which will save all the headers.
